Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of a combo box that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ComboBoxState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ComboBox.DropDownButton> class. The ComboBoxState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawDropDownButton%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
